attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the present prison service is struggling to cope with the current levels of crime, I suggest that for a range of minor offences that 3 strokes of the birch be administered for first offences (instead of the current asbo's etc). A sliding upward scale for more serious offences would guarantee less inmates

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
